title: Migrate language tooling to mise
description:
Migrate /lang directory from multiple version managers (fnm, manual brew installs) to unified mise-based workflow.

## Goals
- Mise manages all runtime versions (Node, Python, Go, Deno, Bun, Ruby)
- uv continues as Python package manager (complementary to mise)
- Single mise.toml configuration
- Deprecated tools remain configured but disabled
- Smooth rollback path

## Phases
- Phase 0: Foundation Setup (2 issues)
- Phase 1: Python Migration (4 issues)
- Phase 2: Node.js Migration (5 issues)
- Phase 3: Go Migration (4 issues)
- Phase 4: TypeScript Runtimes - Deno, Bun (5 issues)
- Phase 5: Ruby Setup (2 issues)
- Phase 6: Cleanup & Documentation (4 issues)

Total: 26 issues

## Principles
1. One language at a time
2. Preserve configurations for rollback
3. Disable, don't delete
4. Test at each step
5. Maintain shell compatibility

See /Users/winnie/.claude/plans/jazzy-soaring-starlight.md for full plan.
